title: 2017 new season S7 cao ni ma fuk u trash system
body:
Guys, the riot is deliberately demoting the ranks for all Gold or above players to a tier lower, I saw platinum ended in S4, and played with legit shi.t players, sadly I got 70% of time on the shi,t team.

And the system is doing this to attract more play time, Im so done with you dumb system riot. If you trying to attract more play time do assign the rank according to the last season like G3 to G2, Plat 1 to Plat 2 etc. Not G1 to S1 and Plat 1 to S4!

Fuk you riot, everyone just wake up! fuking pice of scam crappy strategy.

replies.body: You're playing on the wrong server.
Last season had Dynamic Queue, so a lot of people climbed higher than they should had. Hence the soft reset now.
